briefdescription.para: Get vector of atoms indices from topology.

detaileddescription.para:
This function returns the indices of all particles with type eptAtom, that is shells, vsites etc. are left out.
mtop
Molecular topology
Vector that will be filled with the atom indices

briefdescription.para: Converts a t_atoms struct to an mtop struct.

detaileddescription.para: All pointers contained in atoms will be copied into mtop. Note that this will produce one moleculetype encompassing the whole system.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the name for the topology
The molecular topology output containing atoms.
